definition: any of numerous widely distributed small wading birds of the family Rallidae having short wings and very long toes for running on soft mud, criticize severely
details:
noun
- any of numerous widely distributed small wading birds of the family Rallidae having short wings and very long toes for running on soft mud
- a horizontal bar (usually of wood or metal)
- short for railway
= example: short for railway
- a barrier consisting of a horizontal bar and supports
= synonyms: railing
- a bar or pair of parallel bars of rolled steel making the railway along which railroad cars or other vehicles can roll
= synonyms: track
verb
- criticize severely
= synonyms: fulminate
- spread negative information about
= synonyms: vilify, revile, vituperate
- complain bitterly
= synonyms: inveigh
- fish with a handline over the rails of a boat
= example: fish with a handline over the rails of a boat
- lay with rails
= example: lay with rails
- travel by rail or train
= example: travel by rail or train
= synonyms: train
- convey (goods etc.) by rails
= example: convey (goods etc.) by rails
- separate with a railing
= example: separate with a railing
= synonyms: rail off
- provide with rails
= example: provide with rails
- enclose with rails
= example: enclose with rails
= synonyms: rail in
